author: hroskes
body:
These were scripts developed by @usarica for running HipPy.  I cleaned them up a little bit and put them into the central release so that they're easier to use.

Also moving some plugins in `RecoTracker/TrackProducer` to `plugins/` where they belong as requested in an earlier iteration of HipPy development
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23301#discussion_r191704886

These have been tested and used extensively for several alignment campaigns.

cc @connorpa @adewit @mmusich
title: Hippy scripts
